description: a(n)=Sum_{k=1..n} phi(2*k), where phi = Euler totient function, cf. A000010.
links: Nathaniel Johnston, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: A049690 := proc(n) return add(numtheory[phi](2*k), k=1..n): end: seq(A049690(n),n=0..54); # Nathaniel Johnston, May 24 2011
crossrefs: a(n)=b(2n), where b=A049689. Bisections: A099958, A190815.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
